definition: to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 zhang4 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
containing_words.word: 牡丹虽好，全仗绿叶扶持

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 ping2 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
containing_words.word: 牡丹虽好，全凭绿叶扶持

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , zhong1 xu1 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
containing_words.word: 牡丹虽好，终须绿叶扶持

sentences.english: His father did not hesitate to support and help him.
sentences.chinese: 李父毫不犹豫支持并扶持。

sentences.english: He could help us through wisl.
Family members always stand by one another because blood is thicker than water.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成员都会彼此扶持，因为血浓于水。

sentences.english: Where else are asperger support programs being offered?
sentences.chinese: 还有其他地方提供亚斯伯格综合症扶持计划吗？

sentences.english: We will vigorously develop traditional Chinese medicine and ethnic minority medicine and implement supporting policies.
sentences.chinese: 大力发展中医药和民族医药事业，落实各项扶持政策。

sentences.english: To enliven our economy, we should support the legal individual trade.
sentences.chinese: 要搞活经济就要扶持正当的个体贸易。

sentences.english: Use sharing to support large numbers of fine-grained objects efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 运用分享技巧顶事扶持众多细粒度的对象。

sentences.english: Besides that- I helped the children in the neighbourhood with their lessons.
sentences.chinese: 除了这些，我还扶持邻居家的孩子做功课。

sentences.english: But the problem is excessive fiscal aid can lead to out-flow of state assets.
sentences.chinese: 而过大的政策扶持力度只会导致国家财政流失。

sentences.english: Hand in hand, go to the distance together.
sentences.chinese: 手牵着手，互相扶持着走向远方。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has paid great attention to assisting poor areas to develop education.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府十分注意扶持贫困地区发展教育事业。

sentences.english: The State supports and develops educational undertakings for the disabled.
sentences.chinese: 国家扶持和发展残疾人教育事业。

sentences.english: Restore to me the joy of your salvation and grant me a willing spirit, to sustain me.
sentences.chinese: 求你使我仍得救恩之乐，赐我乐意的灵扶持我。

sentences.english: In the national policy support, there's"Shedui"enterprises development.
sentences.chinese: 在国家政策的扶持下，出现了社队企业大发展的局面。

sentences.english: There's a thin line between companionship and support and dependency.
sentences.chinese: 互相扶持仍是过分依靠，只在一念之间。

sentences.english: The most unlikely pairs will intensely support each other.
sentences.chinese: 最不可能的对子可能热情地互相扶持。

definition: to rope in/fig. to involve sb/to entice
to be in favor of/to support/to back/support/backing/to stand by/CL:個|个[ge4]
